Home Menu Drinks Specials Catering About Us Events Jobs Rewards Contact Us Menu Home Menu Drinks Specials Catering About Us Events Jobs Rewards Contact Us Gift Cards Gift Cards About Monstah Lobstah Monstah Lobstah ABOUT US Welcome to Monstah Lobstah, your ultimate destination for fresh, Northeastern-inspired seafood right here in the heart of Indian Rocks Beach. Our mission is to bring the authentic taste and charm of New England to Floridas Gulf Coast. Monstah Lobstah proudly features fresh live Maine lobsters, a wide variety of fresh seafood, and a menu crafted to delight seafood lovers and families alike. With a focus on quality and value, we offer a dining experience where everyone can enjoy premium meals without breaking the bank. Set in a clean and inviting atmosphere, Monstah Lobstah celebrates the spirit of the sea while paying homage to the beloved local landmark, JDs, which previously called this location home. Weve kept the sense of community alive, infusing our space with both nostalgia and fresh energy. Enjoy live music on our back porch daily, adding a lively and welcoming vibe to every visit. Whether youre looking to enjoy a family night out, a date with unbeatable seafood, or a casual gathering with friends, Monstah Lobstah is the place to be. Come for the lobstah, stay for the memories. We look forward to serving you! The team that has contributed to over 3 decades, as well as the numerous guests over the years is a testament to the success of their hard work and spirit. Hours
